sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import ForceGraph2D from 'react-force-graph-2d'; // Usage: class CypherViz extends React.Component { constructor({driver}) { super(); this.driver = driver; this.state = { query: ` MATCH (n:Character)-[:INTERACTS1]->(m:Character) RETURN n.name as source, m.name as target `, data : {nodes:[ {"name":"Dan Wadwhani","color":"Gray"}, {source:"Fukutaro Nakayama",target:"Toryo Ito"}, {source:"Sander Wassick",target:"Mae Englegeer"}, ]} } } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({query:event.target.value}) } loadData = async () => { let session = await this.driver.session({database:"gameofthrones"}); let res = await session.run(this.state.query); session.close(); console.log(res); let nodes = new Set(); let links = res.records.map(r => { let source = r.get("source"); let target = r.get("target"); nodes.add(source); nodes.add(target); return {source, target}}); nodes = Array.from(nodes).map(name => {return {name}}); this.setState({ data : {nodes, links}}); } render() { return (
